author: m.kalinin
content: I am going to incorporate the feedback on `eth_` methods used by CL clients (https://hackmd.io/E9VKRcmRSc2Imo8RBtqxlw?view) into Engine API spec. What is the best resource/document to be referred as a specification for each of these methods? http://eth.wiki/json-rpc/API ?

author: m.kalinin
content: A related question. We have new block tags post-merge, and Engine API has required data to support all of these tags: `finalized`, `safe`, `unsafe`, `latest == safe`. What is the best document to be updated to make these new tags become a part of post-merge JSON-RPC API?

author: sky.cactus
content: Same document for both.  That is the "official" (but woefully incomplete) location of all of the JSON-RPC stuff.
